items.title: Is Amgen Inc. (AMGN) The Best Healthcare Dividend Stock to Invest in?
items.description: We recently published a list of 13 Best Healthcare Dividend Stocks to Invest in. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) stands against other best healthcare dividend stocks to invest in. The US healthcare sector has been at the forefront since the emergence of COVID-19 in 2020, [â€¦]
